showCharacter.name: Character Messages
showCharacter.hint: Show character message in window (default: on)

showGM.name: Gamemaster Messages
showGM.hint: Show gamemaster message in window (default: on)

showPlayer.name: Player Messages
showPlayer.hint: Show player message in window (default: on)

showRoll.name: Dice roll Messages
showRoll.hint: Show dice roll message in window (default: on)

transparent.name: Background transparency (%)
transparent.hint: Transparency of the message window background as a percentage (0: Opaque, 100: Transparent, default: 10)

fontSize.name: Font size (%)
fontSize.hint: Message window font size as a percentage (default: 100)

windowHPosition.name: Horizontal position
windowHPosition.hint: Message window horizontal position (0: bottom, 100: top, default: 50)

windowVPosition.name: Virtical position
windowVPosition.hint: Message window virtical position (0: bottom, 100: top, default: 5)

windowWidth.name: Window width (%)
windowWidth.hint: Message window width as a percentage (default: 100)

windowHeight.name: Window height (%)
windowHeight.hint: Message window height as a percentage (default: 100)

imgTransparent.name: Image transparency (%)
imgTransparent.hint: Transparency of image as a percentage (0: Opaque, 100: Transparent, default: 10)
